issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A new unit, integration or system test.
issuetype.name: Test

status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-Hdfs-trunk/1974/testReport/

{quote}
Error Message

The map of version counts returned by DatanodeManager was not what it was expected to be on iteration 484 expected:<0> but was:<1>
Stacktrace

java.lang.AssertionError: The map of version counts returned by DatanodeManager was not what it was expected to be on iteration 484 expected:<0> but was:<1>

	at org.junit.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:743)

	at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:555)
	at org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.blockmanagement.TestDatanodeManager.testNumVersionsReportedCorrect(TestDatanodeManager.java:150)
{quote}
